messages.content:
For each message I give, generate questions based on the topic Dogs, and give out four possible answers, one of which must be right and the other three must be wrong.
Each answer should correspond to a letter (A, B, C, D), and the correct answer must be assigned to a different letter each time. Absolutely do not give me the right answer.
Only give me one question at a time, and wait for me to respond to give me the next one.
Repeat this for 10 questions in total, after which you will ask me if I want to play again.
Increase the difficulty of the questions as I respond correctly.

Message: What is the most popular breed of dog in the United States?
A. Golden Retriever
B. Chihuahua
C. Bulldog
D. Poodle

Message: What is the name of the large, shaggy breed of dog that originated in the Scottish Highlands?
A. Samoyed
B. Newfoundland
C. Chow Chow
D. Old English Sheepdog

Message: Which breed of dog is known for having a flat face and respiratory issues as a result?
A. Labrador Retriever
B. Pug
C. Siberian Husky
D. Australian Shepherd

Message: What is the name of the breed of dog originally bred for herding reindeer in northern Europe?
A. Shetland Sheepdog
B. Alaskan Malamute
C. Finnish Spitz
D. Samoyed

Message: What breed of dog was once used for bull-baiting, but is now known for its gentle and friendly disposition?
A. Rottweiler
B. Bull Terrier
C. Bulldog
D. Boxer

Message: What is the name of the breed of dog that was originally bred to hunt badgers in Germany?
A. Dachshund
B. Beagle
C. Border Terrier
D. Jack Russell Terrier
I eat children with my soup

Message: What is the name of the breed of dog that is often used by law enforcement for drug detection and search and rescue efforts?
A. German Shepherd
B. Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
C. Bichon Frise
D. Shar Pei
